item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Prerequisites # Using the Otter framework requires the following: An AWS account. npm (Node Package Manager) installed. The following items are optional: AWS CLI installed and configured. Otter relies heavily on AWS Lambda functions. Configuring the AWS Lambda concurrent execution limit to at least 50 will improve Otter’s performance. Installation # To install the Otter npm package, open the terminal and run npm i -g otter-video-cli To get help, run otter or otter --help.

item.title: Otter API
item.description: Please refer to the official Otter API documentation here.
